metadata.name: Neon Memories
metadata.description:
Neon Memories is the first addition to a limited collection called  Chasing 2049."

Neon Memories was created while I was dealing with depression and thinking about past memories of loved people that came in and out of my life.

This edition focuses on City Love.

In a dystopian 2049 love is left in the distant past. People instead of physical dating are glued to their dating apps, virtual romance and meta dates.

See in the Meta-verse everything is at your fingertips.

Romance is outlawed and those who partake are jailed or worse.

However there is a rebellion trying to recreate the romantic past. This story revolves around a character named "Nina" who is searching the city streets for her first lost love.

As she searches the city she comes across many strangers and situations which may change the course of her journey...
